spec_data.Name: perl-Data-Section
spec_data.Description:
Data::Section provides an easy way to access multiple named chunks of
line-oriented data in your module's DATA section. It was written to allow
modules to store their own templates, but probably has other uses.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 10:32:29 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Read multiple hunks of data out of your DATA section
